duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote advertising services.
Lead a team of creative specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's brand standards and ensure compliance across all creative materials and campaigns.
Participate in the recruitment and hiring of internal staff, ensuring a strong and talented creative team.
Anticipate potential issues and actively resolve problems that may arise, ensuring smooth project execution.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Advertising, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
